title: Buying Behavior
ziele: The course focuses on core theories and findings regarding consumer behavior; students will acquire insight in to basic research methods
lehrinhalte:
Examples: - Perception (e.g., does subliminal perception exist and does subliminal stimuli affect consumer behavior)
- Consumer behavior models
- Attention and directing attention (e.g., how does humor work and affect / influence consumer behavior?)
- Changing brand-appeal (e.g., developing a brand personality, evaluative conditioning)
- Attitudes, persuasion, behavior changes
beurteilung:
- regular attendance 
- Homework assignment: Select advertising material and apply learned theories and findings
- Examination
voraussetzungen: (*)KS Einführung in die Betriebswirtschaftslehre UND KS Marketing
literatur:
Felser, G. (2007). Werbe- und Konsumentenpsychologie. Berlin: Spektrum.

English-language literature is available upon request.
